meanings.definition: Denari: plural of denarius, an ancient Roman silver coin
meanings.sent1: In history class, we learned about the denari used by ancient Romans.
meanings.sent2: I found a collection of denari in my grandfather's attic.
meanings.sent3: The denari rolled off the table and into the cat's toy box.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as rare and precious as a denari in a pile of pennies.
meanings.sent5: The denari gleamed in the sunlight, reflecting centuries of history.

meanings.definition: Denari: a unit of currency in several countries in the Middle East and North Africa
meanings.sent1: When traveling, make sure to exchange your dollars for denari.
meanings.sent2: The market only accepted denari for their goods.
meanings.sent3: He accidentally paid with denari instead of dinars, causing confusion.
meanings.sent4: The value of friendship is worth more than any amount of denari.
meanings.sent5: The denari jingled in his pocket, a reminder of his journey abroad.

meanings.definition: Denari: a monetary unit in the Republic of San Marino
meanings.sent1: The souvenir shop displayed various items priced in denari.
meanings.sent2: Local vendors preferred payment in denari over other currencies.
meanings.sent3: She saved up her denari to buy a special gift for her mom.
meanings.sent4: His generosity was measured not in euros but in denari.
meanings.sent5: The denari symbolized the economic stability of San Marino.
